## gcloud.CloudRunProps.cpu property

CPU resources that can be consumed by this CloudRun deployment

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cpu: string | number;
```

## Remarks

This is a Kubernetes style cpu specification string. 1 is 1 cpu, 2 is 2 cpus, 100m is 100minutes of CPU allocation, etc.

Please look at Google's Cloud Run documentation for more information and any restrictions vs. Kubernetes.
